name: fat_proc_filter_dwis
author: AFNI Developers
description: Filter out user-found and user-defined bad volumes from DWI data sets.

inputs.name: Input DWI
inputs.description: Name of a 4D file of DWIs (required).

inputs.name: Input Gradient File
inputs.description: Bvec/bmat file from the gradients. Required. One of these options must be used: -in_col_matA, -in_col_matT, -in_col_vec, -in_row_vec

inputs.name: Select String
inputs.description: A string of indices and index ranges for selecting which volumes/grads/bvals to keep. This string gets applied to the volume, bval|bvec|bmat files for an input set. Either this or -select_file is required.

inputs.name: Select File
inputs.description: A file containing a string of indices and index ranges for selecting which volumes/grads/bvals to keep. This string gets applied to the volume, bval|bvec|bmat files for an input set. Either this or -select is required.

inputs.name: Output Prefix
inputs.description: Output prefix for all the volumes and text files. Required.

inputs.name: Input Bvals
inputs.description: If the bvec/bmat is a file of unit-magnitude values, then the bvalues can be input.

inputs.name: Unit Magnitude Output
inputs.description: Ensure that the output grad information is unit magnitude.

inputs.name: QC Prefix
inputs.description: Set the prefix of the QC image files separately.

inputs.name: No QC View
inputs.description: Turn off generating QC image files.

inputs.name: No Command Output
inputs.description: Don't save the command line call of this program and the location where it was run.

inputs.name: Do Movie
inputs.description: Output a movie of the newly created dataset (AGIF or MPEG).

output-files.name: Filtered Gradient File
output-files.description: Filtered gradient file matching input format.
